title: Tutorial doesn't work
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/91ea6294df3ac70ba67654b66c7be1e6.png

check the image above. Cannot play tutorial for new account.

what's going on?

replies.body:
I don't have this issue myself, nor have I seen it reported anywhere else. It's possible it is an error with your client.

Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further. The tech side of things isn't my strong suit.
